item.title: I needed somewhere to post this while i was in enc1001
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

public static void QuestHandling(String FileName, int type)
{
    String line = "";
    String token = "";
    String token2 = "";
    String token2_2 = "";
    String[] token3 = new String[10];
    boolean EndOfFile = false;
    int ReadMode = 0;
    BufferedReader characterfile = null;
    try{
        characterfile = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./" + FileName));
    }
    catch(FileNotFoundException fileex){
        misc.printlnTag(FileName + ": file not found.");
        return false;
    }
    try{
        line = characterfile.readLine();
    }
    catch(IOException ioexception){
        misc.printlnTag(FileName + ": error loading file.");
        return false;
    }
    while(EndOfFile == false && line != null){
        line = line.trim();
        int spot = line.indexOf("=");
        if(spot > -1){
            token = line.substring(0, spot);
            token = token.trim();
            token2 = line.substring(spot + 1);
            token2 = token2.trim();
            token2_2 = token2.replaceAll("\t\t", "\t");
            token2_2 = token2_2.replaceAll("\t\t", "\t");
            token2_2 = token2_2.replaceAll("\t\t", "\t");
            token2_2 = token2_2.replaceAll("\t\t", "\t");
            token2_2 = token2_2.replaceAll("\t\t", "\t");
            token3 = token2_2.split("\t");
	if (token.equals("start")){
		int questnumber = Integer.parseInt(token3[0]);
		int queststeps[questnumber][i] = Integer.parseInt(token3[1]);
		String questname = token3[2];
		int onstep[questnumber][0];
	}
	if (token.equals("step") && onquest[questnumber] = true &&  queststeps[questnumber][i] >onsteps[0]){
		if (token3[0].equals("talk") &&onstep == Integer.parseInt(token3[1]))){
			if (token3[0].equals("needs" && onstep == Integer.parseInt(token3[2])){
				if (token3[1].equals("item")&& onstep == Integer.parseInt(token3[3])){
					//impliment item checking
				}
				if (token3[1].equals("slay"onstep == Integer.parseInt(token3[3])){
					//impliment if slayed monster checking
				}
			}
		}
	}
	if (token.equals("end") && onquest[questnumber] = true && queststeps[questnumber][i] == (onstep+1)){
		//impliment the sendframe and rewards here	
		onquest = false;
		onstep = 0;
		completequest[questnumber] = true;
	}
